page.title: 05CARE & PROBLEMS OF ELDERLY
page.content: A nursing sister collaborates with local doctors in the care of the elderly. Treatment such as giving injections and changing dressings is carried out in the patient's home, and where necessary a nurse will help an old age pensioner to bath. Some are visited by a chiropodist at reduced fees.In addition, meals on wheels are available through the Social Services to those living alone who cannot cook well-balanced meals for themselves. There is little public transport in the area which can cause problems for old people who are unable to drive. They do not like to be dependant on friends and neighbours to get to a town or even local clubs & functions. As a result there is a tendency for such people to leave this district for more transport or sheltered housing.
